name: Souten no Shiroki Kami no Kura: Great Peak
overview: Souten no Shiroki Kami no Za - Great Peak puts the player in the role of the captain of an expedition of alpinists in this mountain simulation game. The game is divided into 2 different parts: 1 - The first one is preparing the expedition: Select the team members, make plans for mountain climbling, choose the equipment, select the different routes, camp base, etc 2 - The second one is climbimb the mountain: The game features mountain dangers like falling rocks, avalanches, injuries, etc. The game features 5 different mountains: K-Zero Niconosa (8955m), Sisha Kanli (8482m), Kanga Purna (8021m), Dhaula Chenli (7686m) & Manutse (7128m).
